website_summaries.verdict: If you absolutely need the peace of mind that comes with knowing that your bow, arrows, and gear will make it safely from point A to point B, this ultra-sturdy protective compact bow case is exactly what you’re looking for.
pros: Features custom foam inserts for arrows, single take-down risers, and two sets of limbs
cons: This is an expensive compact bow case
While it is lockable, it does not include a lock

customer_reviews.title: Best case for recurve bows
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 20 stars I would ! This case we use for my daughters Olympic bow & it’s awesome. The company stands behind their products . I now have zero issues getting her bow on an airplane.. so much room in it as well .. only flaw I saw was I wish there was a way to latch or buckle the handle side that rolls because that handle gets a little beat up when rolling it . But that’s about it .. we absolutely love this case !
customer_reviews.author: Ryan A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm, but I haven't flown with it yet
customer_reviews.text: This case have everything I need. I particularly like the fact that it can store two sets of limbs and that it rolls. The only two improvements I could suggest would be 1) make it lighter and 2) make it possible to protect the handles. The handles are very solid and they click-lock in the "down" position, but I worry that if they get pulled up during transport, they may then get knocked off by the cargo gorillas. I have not flown with the case yet, although I'm sure many people have.
customer_reviews.author: Phoetus

customer_reviews.title: Hubby Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Suprised my husband with this for his birthday.I found this in his wish list. I thought he would gripe at me for spending so much money. Not a word ,he must of thought it was worth the cost.He loved it and was so suprised . Very sturdy and well organized. It seemed very heavy to me but he was fine with the weight.This was a good purchase and made him happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: good solid recurve bow case
customer_reviews.text: This was for my son who shoots olympic recurve archery. The pre-cut slots in the foam have worked well for his bow, sights and stabilizer and all of his other equipment he needs. The case is solid and water proof and will withstand many years of hauling away. It is a large case, though, but should last a lifetime. The workmanship on the case is very good and is not cheap but heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: momofboys

customer_reviews.title: A rolling safe for your bow.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to check your bow in with the airlines.. this is the only way to travel! Not cheap, but you get what you pay for. This is a fantastic case.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy James

customer_reviews.title: Recurve Bow Case
customer_reviews.text: This case stands up to being banged around on the airlines. My bow, arrows and accessories are protected and organized. The wheels make it easy to get around. Handles make it easy to carry if you don't want to wheel it. Very well designed. The best part was the price. I went to my normal archery range. They had the same case for 3 times the price I paid through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn M Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: It's built to withstand being hit by a sixteen wheeler. Definitely good for customs, though the handle at the bottom bugged me and I had to take it out. Overall though a very good buy, and it keeps my bow safe and secure so I don't have to worry about it being damaged. Somewhat heavy, and not very space efficient, but it's good at its job.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie De Castro

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My bow originally came with a canvas carrying case that... Saw this, bought it. Definitely a must considering what i spent on the bow.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny delos Santos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent case, especially at the price. It might be overkill for some purposes. But if you plan for air travel it is a good choice. Pros: It has all the space he needs for his gear. Because it is big it has space that for the quiver that many cases lack. It is rugged enough to stand up to air travel and has TSA locks. Cons: It is big and heavy. It offsets this to some degree by having wheels.
customer_reviews.author: rjs58

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: as someone newly involved in the sport of archery, this is perfect. it carries everything and holds MORE than enough arrows...which i need as i've already lost several lol the only downside is having to remove the sight and arrow rest every time i stow my recurve. but that's a minor point.
customer_reviews.author: Bored Squid

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: For the $80 this was selling for you cannot beat this recurve case. Seven more words required, have some extra periods.....
customer_reviews.author: Yuck

customer_reviews.title: This case is SICK!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this case, and who could blame him. It is a beast. It is well made and fits everything he need perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: bow case
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter tells me that the bow case is just the thing she needed to keep her equipment safe.
customer_reviews.author: The Old Junk Yard Dog

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't believe the price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case for my Bob Lee Bow. The price I paid was shockingly low. The case is everything I need for tournaments and hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Jim

product_meta.title: SKB iSeries Recurve Case Black
product_meta.description: The 3i-4214-RC MIL-STD Injection Molded Recurve Bow Case has four (4) SKB patented trigger latches, four reinforced padlock locations, cushioned snap down handles on three (3) sides and recessed, in-line skate style wheels, transporting your gear around the world is both worry and trouble free. The interior of the 3i-4214-RC MIL-STD Injection Molded Recurve Bow Case features a custom foam insert for secure positioning and cushioning of your gear. New state of the art water-jet cut foam arrow system that holds up to a dozen arrows is included. The 3i-4214-RC MIL-STD Injection Molded Recurve Bow case has a uni-body design, which eliminates the need for excessive metal reinforcing hardware found on traditional flight cases. This case is under 20 lbs (empty)!
feature_bullets: Fits 1 recurve riser and 1 set of limbs
